summary:
Youâ€™re probably tired maintaining your data center , infrastructure , network , and you're not quite getting the results you want, or you probably know what you need to do to get to where you want to be and already invest in high quality hardware but you're not quite getting the performance you deserve, what you might really missing is EEE service that provide real Engagement, outstanding Engineering, Expert services that help you to leverage your investment to maximum potential and help you to scale and enrich your business.

I've master of engineering degree in information technology specialized in networks and systems, MBA and ITIL certified. dynamic professional, self-motivated and quick learner, over 20 years of hands on experience in IT technologies, Telecommunication, Managed services, and Customer technical support, Master Cisco, Huawei, Juniper, F5, Citrix, Bluecoat, Avaya Products and services. 

 	I have both vendor expertise and service provider operation expertise, currently working as Technical consultant for ğ’ğ˜ğ‘ğ•ğ’ Technologies, and Previously work for NGS as Solution manager, and as Network Services Supervisor for MTN Telecom Operator and as Network Product Line Team leader for Huawei Global Technical support.

I use proven practices and validated design to architect solutions and resolve problems, take initiatives, and plan strategically, keep monitor, audit and improve the quality of network and security for long-term health run of the organization services, while keep a positive environment that supports innovation, teamwork and successful outcomes, align with organizational mission, structures, and resources. 

I've Managed large scale projects including National Internet Gateway, National Access Network, NGN Service Provider, Internet Service Provider, Data Centre and Enterprise networks in Middle East ( Lebanon, Iraq, Syria, ..) and Africa ( Rwanda, Kenya, Cote vore, ...)

Skills:
Routing and Switching, Security, Data Center, Collaboration, Access, Management Systems.

Drop me a massage or contact me and I'll be glad to be on help in anyway, we now offer 30% discount on all of our services including : Support , Deployment, Auditing , Optimization, Automate and Documentations,and 50% discount on Technologies training ,
